title: Irish coffee
description: Don't stir the cream into the coffee, but drink it through the cream and for a change, you can use your favourite liquer instead of whiskey.

default: a good glug of Irish whiskey
hot strong coffee to fill the glass

steps: Use warmed coffee glasses and add the whiskey.
Add the sugar and dissolve in the whiskey.
Add the coffee and stir well.
Float the whipped cream on top and serve.
